Posts.Content: May 5, 2018 09:45AM Kushie wrote: I had my bi literal mastectomy and sentinel lymph node biopsy 5 days ago. I am finding the pain in my arm pit to be almost unbearable at times. I am taking my pain meds as prescribed and still get burning pain in my arm pit. I don’tKnow if this is pain from the nerves or just the normal pain from the procedure but I am praying it doesn’t last too much longer. Did anyone else find the pain to be this intense?
